::Havotron/Needlenose::
"Hmmm" Havotron pondered the continuous silence of Spinister. He 
liked it. "Welcome to the D.E.D. Just no, my rule, is the only rule. 
You disobey, you will be forced into the pit. Now, I beleive that the 
Autobots are set to leave so we must be as well.  Soundwave, call 
back the other D.E.D's"

Needlenose bowed, and followed Spinister lead not saying anything, 
until Sunstreak transformed and jumped up towards Havotron. "Like, 
good to be with you dude." He was met with the backhand of Havotron 
and sent into a wall. "Sunstreak..." Needlenose called out.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister nodded his head. He folded his arms, and sat there 
watching.
> Singe leapt off and transformed. "Yeah, we've known Needlenose 
since the
> binary bonding on..." he was cut off by a glare from Spinister, and
> decided it best to be quiet.
